item.title: RSS/Atom gripe
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: Writing some more parsing code for Blog Buzz Machine, how is it that RSS 2.0 seems to have 3 different ways of including the publish date for a blog entry? We're up to over 88,000 blogs now.
item.excerpt:encoded: Writing some more parsing code for Blog Buzz Machine, how is it that RSS 2.0 seems to have 3 different ways of including the publish date for a blog entry? We're up to over 88,000 blogs now.
